    • Method Detail

      • isEqual

        public boolean isEqual(java.awt.image.BufferedImage compareImage,
                       java.awt.image.BufferedImage mask,
                       ComparisonAlgorithm algorithm)
        Checks whether two images can be considered equal as determined by the given algorithm
        Parameters:
        compareImage - The image that is compared to the reference image
        mask - The mask that sets the dynamic content areas, which are ignored in the comparison
        algorithm - The algorithm with which the assertion is calculated
        Returns:
        true if the two images are calculated as equal, false if not

      • isEqual

        public boolean isEqual(java.awt.image.BufferedImage compareImage,
                       MaskImage mask,
                       ComparisonAlgorithm algorithm)
        Checks whether two images can be considered equal as determined by the given algorithm
        Parameters:
        compareImage - The image that is compared to the reference image
        mask - The mask as instance of MaskImage that sets the dynamic content areas, which are ignored in the comparison
        algorithm - The algorithm with which the assertion is calculated
        Returns:
        true if the two images are calculated as equal, false if not

      • getMarkedImageWithAMarker

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getMarkedImageWithAMarker(int markingSizeX,
                                                              int markingSizeY)
        Creates a copy of the originally with isEqual tested image in which the found differences are highlighted in a different color scheme
        Parameters:
        markingSizeX - The size of the marking on the x axis
        markingSizeY - The size of the marking of the y axis
        Returns:
        BufferedImage with the originally found differences highlighted

      • getMarkedImageWithBoxes

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getMarkedImageWithBoxes(int markingSizeX,
                                                            int markingSizeY)
        Creates a copy of the originally with isEqual tested image in which the found differences are marked with red boxes.
        Parameters:
        markingSizeX - The size of the marking on the x axis
        markingSizeY - The size of the marking of the y axis
        Returns:
        BufferedImage with the originally found differences marked with boxes

      • getDifferenceImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getDifferenceImage()
        Creates a new image in which only the found differences are displayed on a black background. The differences are drawn in the exact locations where they were found in the original image
        Returns:
        BufferedImage with differences in grey on a black background
